Layer.RefreshCommand: % function(self) if GAMESTATE:IsEventMode() then self:settext('EVENT MODE') return end if GAMESTATE:GetCoinMode()==COIN_MODE_FREE then self:settext('FREE PLAY') return end if GAMESTATE:GetCoinMode()==COIN_MODE_HOME then self:settext('') return end local coins=GAMESTATE:GetCoins() local coinsPerCredit=PREFSMAN:GetPreference('CoinsPerCredit') local credits=math.floor(coins/coinsPerCredit) local remainder=math.mod(coins,coinsPerCredit) local s='CREDIT(S) : ' if credits>0 then s=s..credits..' ' end s=s..remainder..'/'..coinsPerCredit self:settext(s) end
%function(self) self:diffusealpha(0); self:zoom(0); self:linear(0.08); self:zoom(0.5); self:diffusealpha(0.85); self:sleep(0.08); self:linear(0.1); self:diffusealpha(0) end
